summary:
Sophie Smith is one of the third-class passengers on the Campania.

Sophie is a young woman. She has her hair tied up in a bun; her fringes run down alongside both sides of her face. She wears a plain, white-sleeved shirt and a skirt.

Sophie is a cheerful and sociable person, who appears to enjoy celebrations. She finds Ronald Knox charming.
name: ソフィー・スミス
